title: MaceOptimiser
description: This mod helps fix ghost hits on servers by preventing client-side attacks beyond valid reach distance.
detailedDescription:
In Minecraft PvP and PvE, lag often causes Ghost Hits—situations where your client thinks you hit an enemy, plays the sound and particles, but the server rejects it because you were slightly too far away.

The Solution:

This Fabric mod acts as a client-side range limiter. It calculates the exact distance to your target before you swing. If the target is further than 3.0 blocks (the standard survival reach), the mod prevents the attack packet from sending.

Features:
• Instant Feedback: If you don't swing, you know you need to move closer.
• Client-Side Only: Works on any server without needing to be installed on the server.
• Lightweight: Zero performance impact.
• Fair Play: Does not increase reach; it only validates it to match vanilla behavior.

changelog.changes: Initial release. Client-side range limiter to prevent ghost hits. Works on any server without installation.
Backport to 1.21.3. Same features as 1.21.4 version.

title: Epic Sword Collection
description: A comprehensive collection of medieval and fantasy swords with custom animations and particle effects.
detailedDescription:
The Epic Sword Collection is the ultimate weapon mod for Minecraft. Featuring over 40 handcrafted swords ranging from basic iron blades to legendary mythical weapons, this mod brings an entirely new level of combat depth to your world.

Each sword comes with unique particle effects, custom animations, and special abilities. Legendary swords can only be obtained through rare crafting recipes that require items from across the world — defeating bosses, exploring deep caves, and trading with villagers.

The mod is fully compatible with popular combat mods and integrates smoothly with JEI for recipe viewing. Textures are hand-painted at 64x64 resolution and scale beautifully at higher resource pack resolutions.

What's included:
• 40+ unique sword designs
• Custom swing and hit animations
• Particle effects on all legendary swords
• Special ability system (fire damage, poison, lifesteal)
• Full JEI integration
• Compatible with Optifine and Iris shaders

Performance optimizations for multiplayer. Fixed crash with enchantment combos.

title: Medieval Castle Pack
description: High-detail 3D structure pack including towers, walls, gates, and interior furnishings.
detailedDescription:
The Medieval Castle Pack brings an incredibly detailed castle experience to Minecraft. Built entirely from vanilla blocks, this structure pack includes a fully explorable castle with multiple rooms, hidden passages, and lore-rich interior design.

The main castle features a grand entrance gate, spiral staircases, a throne room, a dungeon, a library, and multiple towers with unique purposes. Every room has been carefully decorated to feel lived-in and immersive.

This pack is perfect for adventure maps, roleplay servers, or anyone who wants an impressive medieval build without spending hours placing blocks manually. Simply use a structure loader or Litematica to place it in your world.

What's included:
• Full castle structure with 12+ rooms
• Underground dungeon with cells and traps
• Throne room with detailed throne and banners
• Library with bookshelves and lore books
• 4 guard towers with arrow loops
• Hidden passages and secret rooms
• Compatible with Litematica and WorldEdit

changelog.changes: Added throne room interior. New banner and flag variants. Optimized mesh topology.
Initial release. Full castle structure with 12 rooms.
Fixed block placement issues on 1.20.2. Added LOD variants.
Fabric compatibility layer added. Litematica support included.

title: Ultra Realistic Resource Pack
description: Professional-grade texture overhaul with physically based rendering at 128x and 256x resolution.
detailedDescription:
Ultra Realistic Resource Pack is one of the most detailed and visually stunning texture packs available for Minecraft. Every single block, item, and mob has been completely redrawn using physically based rendering (PBR) techniques, giving your world an incredibly realistic and immersive look.

The pack ships in two resolutions — 128x for smoother performance on mid-range systems, and 256x for those who want maximum detail. Both versions include full normal maps and emissive maps for use with OptiFine or Iris Shaders.

Special attention has been paid to small details — grass blades have individual shading, stone blocks have micro-crack detail, and water has a natural ripple pattern. The custom sky adds clouds, stars, and a realistic sun and moon.

What's included:
• Full block texture overhaul (128x and 256x)
• Custom sky, sun, moon, and clouds
• Animated water and lava textures
• Custom mob skins (creeper, skeleton, zombie, etc.)
• Emissive glow on glowstone, torches, and lanterns
• Normal maps for OptiFine / Iris
• Item and GUI retexture
• Custom particle effects

changelog.changes: Added 50+ new stone and brick textures. All textures now available in 8K. Improved normal maps.
New custom sky and weather effects. Added emissive block textures.
Fixed tiling issues on fabric materials. Added seamless metal variants.
Initial 1.19.4 release. Full block and item texture overhaul.

title: Advanced Terrain Tool
description: Procedural terrain generation mod with biome support, erosion simulation, and custom heightmap import.
detailedDescription:
Advanced Terrain Tool is the most powerful terrain generation mod available for Minecraft. Whether you're building a survival world with dramatic landscapes or creating an adventure map with custom terrain, this mod gives you full control.

The mod features a real-time in-game GUI where you can adjust terrain parameters, preview changes before applying, and generate massive landscapes in seconds. It uses GPU-accelerated noise generation for blazing fast performance — even on large worlds.

You can import heightmaps from any PNG image, letting you recreate real-world locations or custom designs. The built-in biome system supports 20+ presets including mountains, valleys, islands, deserts, and frozen tundras. An advanced erosion simulation adds natural-looking river carving and cliff weathering.

What's included:
• Real-time terrain preview in-game
• 20+ biome presets
• PNG heightmap import
• Erosion and river simulation
• GPU-accelerated generation
• Custom brush tools for manual sculpting
• Export terrain as schematic
• Compatible with WorldEdit and Litematica

changelog.changes: Complete UI overhaul. GPU-accelerated real-time preview. 20+ new biome presets.
Added heightmap import from PNG. New erosion simulation system.
Performance fix for large terrain gen. Fixed memory leak.
Forge 1.20.4 port. Resolved command conflicts with other mods.
Legacy Forge 1.19.2 build. Basic terrain generation included.

title: Futuristic Weapon Arsenal
description: Complete sci-fi weapon mod with energy weapons, railguns, plasma rifles, and gravity guns.
detailedDescription:
Futuristic Weapon Arsenal completely transforms Minecraft combat with a full lineup of high-tech sci-fi weaponry. From standard energy pistols to devastating planet-destroying cannons, this mod adds over 25 unique weapons each with custom models, animations, particle effects, and sound effects.

The weapon system includes a tiered progression — you start with basic energy weapons and unlock more powerful ones as you gather rare materials from ender cities, ocean monuments, and deep slate caves. Every weapon can be upgraded at a custom crafting station with modular components.

The mod also includes a gravity gun that can pick up and throw blocks and mobs, a time-freeze device that slows down everything around you, and a portal gun for short-range teleportation. All weapons have custom projectile models and impact effects.

• 25+ unique sci-fi weapons
• Custom 3D weapon models and animations
• Particle effects and custom projectiles
• Gravity gun, time-freeze, and portal gun
• Modular upgrade system
• Custom crafting station
• Full sound effects
• JEI recipe integration

title: Immersive Nature Pack
description: Beautiful nature-themed resource pack with custom leaf textures, flower beds, and lush biome overhauls.
detailedDescription:
Immersive Nature Pack transforms every biome in Minecraft into a breathtaking landscape. This resource pack focuses entirely on making the natural world look as vibrant, lush, and alive as possible — from the way leaves sway in the breeze to the way flowers bloom across meadows.

Leaf blocks now feature dozens of colour variations and an animated rustling effect when viewed with OptiFine or Iris Shaders. Grass has been completely redone with layered textures that give depth and realism. Water is now crystal clear with subtle caustic light effects on the floor beneath it.

The pack includes over 40 new flower variants spread across plains, forests, and mountain biomes. Every tree species has been individually redrawn — oak, birch, spruce, dark oak, jungle, acacia, and cherry blossom all have unique styles that make forests feel diverse and natural.

What's included:
• Animated leaf textures (OptiFine / Iris)
• 40+ new flower variants
• Layered grass with depth shading
• Crystal clear water with caustics
• Redrawn all 7 tree species
• Custom mushroom and vine textures
• Seasonal colour variants
• Matching GUI and inventory textures

changelog.changes: Major overhaul. New animated leaf textures. Custom water shader. 30+ new flowers.
Added cherry blossom and bamboo texture sets.

title: Redstone Helper
description: A handy tool mod that shows signal strength and highlights active redstone paths with visual overlays.
detailedDescription:
Redstone Helper is an essential tool for any Minecraft builder who works with redstone. Debugging redstone contraptions has never been easier — this mod adds a full set of visual overlays directly into the game that show you exactly what's happening with your signal paths in real time.

When you hold a redstone component or enable the overlay hotkey, the mod instantly highlights every active redstone path in your area. Signal strength is shown as a colour gradient — bright red for full power (15), fading to dark red for weak signals (1). Repeaters show their delay visually, and comparators display their output mode.

The mod also includes a "trace" mode where you can click on any redstone block and it will follow the entire signal path for you, showing you start to finish where your power is going — and where it stops. This alone saves hours of frustration.

What's included:
• Real-time signal strength heatmap overlay
• Repeater delay visualizer
• Comparator output mode display
• Signal path trace tool (click to follow)
• Hotkey toggle for overlays (default: R)
• Works with vanilla and modded redstone
• Zero performance impact when disabled
• Configurable overlay colours

changelog.changes: New signal strength heatmap overlay. Added repeater delay visualizer.
Initial release. Basic redstone path highlighting.
1.20.2 port. Fixed overlay flicker bug.
Forge 1.20.4 compatible build. Resolved overlay render order.

title: Dark Fantasy Resource Pack
description: A moody, gothic-themed resource pack with dark stone textures, custom mob skins, and a deep atmospheric palette.
detailedDescription:
Dark Fantasy Resource Pack transforms Minecraft into a grim, gothic world dripping with atmosphere. Every texture has been carefully crafted to fit a dark fantasy aesthetic — crumbling stone, rusted iron, ancient wood, and an eerie colour palette that makes every biome feel like a different chapter of a dark story.

The pack goes far beyond just blocks. All mob skins have been fully redrawn — creepers look like shadowy wraiths, skeletons are ancient death knights, and zombies are twisted undead. The End dimension has been completely overhauled with dark purple and black textures that make it feel like a true underworld.

Weather and sky effects have also been reworked. The default sky is a deep twilight blue, stars are brighter, and the moon casts an eerie glow. Rain feels darker and stormier. Combined with OptiFine shaders, the result is an incredibly immersive dark fantasy world.

What's included:
• Full gothic block texture overhaul
• Redrawn mob skins (creeper, skeleton, zombie, phantom)
• Complete End dimension retexture
• Dark twilight sky and moon
• Custom rain and storm effects
• Eerie torch and lantern glow
• Dark GUI and inventory textures
• Compatible with OptiFine and Iris shaders

changelog.changes: Added custom end dimension textures. New dragon lair structure textures. Improved lighting ambiance.
Added creeper and skeleton reskins. New dark oak and spruce textures.
Fixed torch and lantern glow colors. Added cave texture variants.
1.19.4 initial release. Full block and mob texture set.
